title: Scan to Pay via QR
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

[How do I use Scan to Order on GCash?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/36066111052441-How-do-I-use-Scan-to-Order-on-GCash)

[How can I use Scan to Pay via QR Code?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017563034-How-can-I-use-Scan-to-Pay-via-QR-Code)

[Can GCash QR Payments be used in other countries?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/7540023800601-Can-GCash-QR-Payments-be-used-in-other-countries)

[I can’t scan the QR code. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31315639906073-I-can-t-scan-the-QR-code-What-do-I-do)

[I was charged multiple times after using Scan to Pay QR. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31315974255129-I-was-charged-multiple-times-after-using-Scan-to-Pay-QR-What-do-I-do)

[Merchant didn't receive the payment and/or SMS when I used Scan to Pay. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31316001083289-Merchant-didn-t-receive-the-payment-and-or-SMS-when-I-used-Scan-to-Pay-What-do-I-do)

Back to Top

description: Scan to pay via QR at over 70,000 stores nationwide or send via QR to other GCash users
